interestingFact: India is the world's largest democracy.
The U.S. has the world's largest economy by nominal GDP.
The Amazon rainforest, the largest tropical rainforest, is in Brazil.
Japan is made up of over 6,800 islands.
Germany is known for its engineering and automotive industries.
The Eiffel Tower in Paris was once the tallest man-made structure in the world.
Australia is home to the world's largest coral reef system—the Great Barrier Reef.
South Africa has three capital cities: Pretoria, Bloemfontein, and Cape Town.
Russia is the largest country in the world by land area.
Canada has more lakes than the rest of the world combined.
